txt.en: 'I know she will. I am not worried for her safety! I am worried because I became used to having her around. I will miss her fiery spirit, her thinly-veiled barbs about these lands and my peopleâ€¦\n\n'Perhaps I will not miss those as much, after all. But I will miss hearing her give voice to them. Nona was not one of my people, but she had become a dearest friend, and I miss her already. Listen to me! I will be writing a song before you know it. I will do my best to refrain, for your sake and for Corudan's.'
She will be all right, Horn.
